resources.string: Accaren-ik n tbaḍnit ad d-ttwaseknen dagi.
1 yiccer i yeldin. Sit akken ad tbeddleḍ iccer.
%1$s waccaren yeldin. Sit akken ad tettbeddileḍ gar waccaren.
Ikcem ɣer uskar n uget-afran, fren iccaren akken ad teskelseḍ ɣer tegrumma
Aql-ak deg tɣimit n usfaylu uslig

%1$s iseffeḍ amazray-ik n unadi d tunigin seg waccaren n tunigin tusligin mi ara tent-tmeḍleḍ neɣ mi ara teffɣeḍ seg usnas. Ɣas wama aya ur yettarra ara d udrig deg yismal web neɣ deg usaǧǧaw-ik n unekcum Internet, aya ad k-yeǧǧ ad tḥarzeḍ tabaḍnit n urmud-ik srid i wid yesseqdacen ibenk-ik.
Tiktiwin tigejdanin yuzzlen ur nṣeḥḥi ara
Rnu anegzum akken ad teldiḍ iccaren usligen seg ugdil agejdan.
Tzemreḍ ad tesbaduḍ akken ad yeldi iseɣwan s wudem awurman deg isnasen.
Isɛa anekcum ɣer tkamiṛat. Ddu ɣer iɣewwaṛen Android, sit ɣef tisirag, sakin senned sireg.
Sbadu amdel awurman n icarren yeldin ur twalaḍ ara deg ussan, imalasen, agguren ineggura.
Senfel taneɣruft n waccaren yeldin. Ddu ɣer yiɣewwaren syen fren iẓiki deg n yiccer.
Ur izmir ara ad yeqqen. Azenziɣ n tensa URL ur yettwassen ara.
Sireg isumar n unadi deg yisfuyla n tunigin tusligin?
%s ad yazen sekra n wayen i tettaruḍ deg ufeggag n tansiwin ɣer umsedday-inek n unadi s wudem amezwer.
Nadi srid seg ufeggag n tansiwin
Sireg tuṭṭfa n ugdil deg tunigin tusligt
Ma yella yettusireg, accaren usligen ad d-banen ula d nutni ma yili aṭas n yisnasen i yeldin
Amiḍan Firefox/Aqeddac n umtawi ittwasnifel, Ffeɣ seg usnas akken ad iddu usnifel…
Mtawi ticraḍ n yisebtar, azray, awalen uffiren, akked waṭas-nniḍen s umiḍan n Firefox
Ales tuqqna akken ad ikemmel umtawi
Sken isumar n tkatut ɣef afus
Tagrumma n yizegrar tettwabeddel. Ffeɣ seg usnas akken ad ddun yibeddilen…
Isem n yibenk ur yezmir ara ad yili d ilem.
Ilɣa n yiccaren yettwaremsen seg Firefox ɣef yibenlan-nniḍen.
Sewḥel agbur akked iskripten i k-yeṭṭafaṛen srid
Ammesten mgal aḍfaṛ yensa i yismal-a web
Tisuraf ad k-ǧǧent ad tsenseḍ aùùesten mgal aḍfaṛ i kra n yismal.
Ad yebḍu isefka ɣef timellit, aseqdec, arrum d wudem n yiminig-ik i Mozilla akken ad aɣ-d-yefk afus i usnerni n %1$s
Bḍu isefka ɣef timahilin i tseqdaceḍ deg %1$s s Leanplum, Imzenzi-nneɣ n izirazen.
Ibeṭṭu isefka n useqdec azadur akked Adjust, amsenzi-nneɣ n ssuq n uziraz
Sireg Mozilla ad tesbedded sakin ad tseddu studies
Ad yeǧǧ Mozilla ad tesbedd daɣen ad telqeḍ isefka n tmahilin tirmitanin
Ḍumm-d tangalt n uciddi seg Firefox i uselkim
Snirem tangalt QR i yettwaseknen deg firefox.com/pair
Drurem i wakken ad teffreḍ agalis n yifecka
Err agalis n yifecka deg tama i ubeddel n waccaren
Err agalis n yifecka deg usawen i twaledyawt n waccaren
D tidet tebɣiḍ ad tsefḍeḍ isadaren?
Suref-aɣ. %1$s ur izmir ara ad isali asebter-nni.
Tzemreḍ ad tɛerḍeḍ ad terret neɣ ad tmedleḍ iccer-a ddaw-a.
Azen aneqqis n uɣelluy i Mozilla
Qqen akken ad twaliḍ ticṛaḍ n isebtar imtawin
Agalis n unekcum uzrib ɣer yiɣewwaṛen
Sewḥel imeslawen d tvidyutin ded yisefka izirazen kan
Imeslawen d tividyutin ad uraren deg WI-FI
Lqeḍ tiɣawsiwin i yesεan aẓal ɣur-k·m.\n Semlilil akk inadiyen ittcabin, ismal, d iccaren i unekcum arurad ticki.
Akken ad tazneḍ iccer, qqen ɣer Firefox xarsum ɣef yiwen n yibenk.
Ur yizmir ara ad ibḍu ɣer usnas-a
Issin ugar γef tuzba n iccaren…
S tukksa n iccer-a ad tettwakkes akk tegrumma. Tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ tagrumma tamaynut melmi i tebɣiḍ.
Aḍris-a d amedya. akken ad tezṛeḍ amek ara d-iban u dris mi ara ad tesneɣseḍ neɣ ad ternuḍ tuɣzi deg iɣewwaṛen.
Semɣer neɣ senɣes teɣzi n uḍris n yismal web
Teɣzi n tsefsit ad temṣada akked iɣewwaren Android. Sens aɣewwar-a akken ad tesferkeḍ teɣzi n tsefsit.
Azray n tunigin akked isefka n yismal
Ad teffɣeḍ seg tuget n yismal
Kkes isefka n tunigin mi ara tefɣeḍ
Ad yekkes s wudem awurman isefka n tunigin ticki tferneḍ "Ffeɣ" seg umuɣ agejdan
Ad yekkes s wudem awurman isefka n tunigin ticki tferneḍ "Ffeɣ" seg umuɣ agejdan
Aya ad yekkes meṛṛa isefka-ik n tunigin.
%s ad yekkas isefka n tunigin yettwafernen.
Firefox Preview tura yuɣal d Firefox Nightly
Firefox Nightly iseɛɛu llqem yal iḍ u ttilint deg-s timahilin tirmitanin timaynutin. Dacu, yezmer ad yenɣes urkad. Sider iminig-nneɣ beta i tarmit irekden ugar.

. Asnas-agi ur yettɛawad ara ad yermes ileqman n tɣellist. Ur seqdac ara asnas-agi, beddel ɣer Nightly amaynut. \n\nAkken ad tazneḍ ticraḍ n yisebtar, inekcam, akked umazray ɣer usnas-nniḍen, rnu amiḍan Firefox.

Asnas-agi ur yettɛawad ara ad yermes ileqman n tɣellist. Awi Nightlu amaynut u seḥbes aseqdec n usnas-agi. \n\nAkken ad tazneḍ ticraḍ n yisebtar, inekcam, akked umazray ɣer usnas-nniḍen, rnu amiḍan Firefox.
Tesεiḍ asteqsi ɣef %s ittwasinflen? Tebɣiḍ ad tezreḍ acu ibeddlen?
Awi-d ticraḍ n yisebtar, amazray, d wawalen uffiren ɣer Firefox deg yibenk-a.
Aql-ak·akem teqqneḍ d %s ɣef yiminig-nniḍen n Firefox s yibenk-a. Tebɣiḍ ad teqqneḍ s umiḍan-a?
Firefox yessewḥal s wudem awurman tikebbaniyin ara ak-iḍefren deg web.
Yerked gar tbaḍnit akked temlellit. ISebtar ad d-alin s wudem amagnu.
Isewḥal ugar n ineḍfaren akken isebtar ad d-allin s wudem aurad, maca kra n tmahilin n usebter zemrent ad rẓent.
Fren adig n ufeggag-ik·im n yifecka
Eǧǧ afeggag n yifecka ɣef wafus. Eǧǧ-it ddaw neɣ err-it d asawen.
Ldi iccer uslig tikkelt: Senned tignit %s.
Ldi iccaren usligen yal tikkelt: Leqqem iɣewwaṛen n iminig.
Nfeṣṣel %si w akken ad nerr gar ifassen-ik·im ayen i tbeṭṭuḍ srid aked wayen tbeṭṭuḍ yid-neɣ.
Ḥreze tabatrit d wallen-ik s uskar aberkan.
Deg uselkim-ik, ldi Firefox sakin kcem ɣer https://firefox.com/pair
Seqdec tansa n yimayl deg umḍiq-is
Ulac amiḍan? <u>Rnu yiwen</u> i umtaw n Firefox gar yibenkan.
Firefox ad iseḥbes amtawi d umiḍan-inek, acukan ur ittekkes ara isefka-inek n tunigin seg uselkim-a.
%s ad iseḥbes amtawi d umiḍan-inek, acukan ur ittekkes ara isefka-inek n tunigin seg uselkim-a.
Ur izmir ara ad yeẓreg ikaramen imewar
Ḥrez isefka-ik i kečč. %s ad k-yemmesten seg tuget n yineḍfaṛen yettwassnen i yeṭṭafaṛen ayen i txeddmeḍ srid.
Yerked gar tbaḍnit akked temlellit. ISebtar ad d-alin s wudem amagnu.
Ayen iweḥlen s ummeten n tizeɣt mgal aḍfaṛ
Isewḥal ugar n ineḍfaren akken isebtar ad d-allin s wudem aurad, maca kra n tmahilin n usebter zemrent ad rẓent.
Ayen iweḥlen s ummeten n uḥriṣ mgal aḍfaṛ
Fren ineḍfaren akked yisekripten ara tesweḥleḍ.
Ayen iweḥlen s ummeten udmawan mgal aḍfaṛ
Ineḍfaṛen gar yismal akked iẓeḍwa inmettiyen
Inagan n tuqqna n yismal ur yettwarzan ara
Akk inagan n tuqqna wis kraḍ (zemren ad rẓen isaml web)
Akk inagan n tuqqna (ad rẓen isaml web)
Talast n tezmert n yiẓeḍwa n tmetti deg uḍfaṛ n urmud-ik n tunigin deg web.
Inagan n tuqqna i uḍfaṛ gar yismal
Ad isewḥel inagan n tuqqna i seqdacen iberraḥen n udellel akked tkebbaniyin n tesledt i ulqaḍ n yisefka-ik n tunigin deg ddeqs n yismal.
Ad isewḥel yir iskripten ad kecmen ɣer yibenk-ik akken ad kksen tadrimt tumḍint.
Ad isewḥel alqaḍ n yisefka yettwammalen s wudem asuf ɣef yibenk-ik daɣen wid i izemren ad ttwasqedcen i uḍfar.
Ad isewḥel adellel, tividyutin akked ugbur-nniḍen i d-yekka beṛṛa n usmel, win i igebren tangalt n uḍfaṛ. Izmer ad iḥaz kra n tmahilin n usmel.
Yal mi ara yili urti d ajenjaṛ, %s isewḥel ineḍfaren ɣef usmel. Sit i wugar n talɣut.
Ammesten yennerna mgal aḍfaṛ yensa i yismal-a web
Timkerḍiyin n uɣbalu yeldin i nseqdac
D acu i d maynut deg %s
Yesfaḍay inagan n tuqqna yettusbadun s yiwellhen n yismal web n uḍfar yettwassnen.
Umuɣ n tseɣtit: %1$d senned s uẓelmaḍ akken ad irmed
Tzemreḍ s sshal ad ternuḍ asmel-a web ɣer ugdil agejdan n yibenk-inek·inem i wakken ad tesɛuḍ anekcum askudan d tunigin taruradt s termt i icuban asnas.
Anekcum i tḥerzeḍ ɣer %s ad d-ittwasken da.
Inekcam akked wawalen uffiren ur yettwaskelsen ara ad ttwaseknen dagi.
Inekcam akked wawalen uffiren ur ttwaseklasen ara i yismal-a.
Serreḥ akken ad tsekneḍ inekcam-ik yettwaskelsen
Tuqqna-agi mačč d taɣelsant. Inekcam yettwagren dagi zemren ad ttwakkren.
Isem n useqdac yenɣel ɣef afus
Serreḥ akken ad tsekneḍ inekcam-ik yettwaskelsen
Sbadu azenziɣ n usekkeṛ, tangal PIN, neɣ awal uffir akken ad temmesteneḍ inekcam-ik akked wawlen-ik uffiren yettwaskelsen ticki yella win ikecmen ɣer yibenk-ik.
Rmed akken ad teǧǧeḍ asemɣer neɣ asemẓi s sin n yiḍudan ula deg yismal web i yessewḥalen aya.
Asekles d taččart tawurmant n tkarḍiwin
Ma ulac aɣilif sekcem uṭṭun ameɣtu n tkarḍa n usmad
Kkes asekkeṛ i wakken ad twaliḍ tikerḍiwin-ik·im yettwaskelsen
Sbadu taneɣruft n usekkeṛ n yibenk, tangalt PIN neq awal uffir i ummesten n tkerḍiwin-ik·im n usmad yettwaskelsen ticki yella win ikecmen ɣer yibenk-inek·inem.
Kkes asekkeṛ i wakken ad tesqedceḍ talɣut n tkarḍa n usmad
Talqayt ɣef umsedday n unadi udmawan
Sekcem isem n umsedday n unadi
Amsedday n unadi s yisem “%s” yella yakan.
Senqed akken aḍris n unadi yemsaḍa akked tawsit n umedya
Iminig amaynut ittraǧu-ken, Iteddu akken iwata i yesεan timahalin iggerzen ara awen-ifkken tallelt i tuqqna.\n \nTtxil rǧu ad ifak lqem%s n
Tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ tisirag meṛṛa i yismal meṛṛa?
Tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ tisirag meṛṛa i usmel-a?
Tebɣiḍ ad tekkseḍ tisirag-a i usmel-a?
Tebɣiḍ ad tekseḍ Ticraḍ-a n iccaren?
Urti n uḍris yettusenfal i tansa n unekcum n web.
Urti n uḍris yettusenfal i yisem n useqdac n unekcum.
Urti n uḍris yettusenfal i wawal uffir n unekcum.
Anekcam s yisem-agi n useqdac yella yakan
Ma ulac aɣilif, rmed amtawi n waccaren.
Ulac ɣur-k accarren yeldin deg Firefox deg yibenkan-inek-nniḍen.
Wali tabdart n waccaren seg yibenkan-ik-nniḍen.
I tmerna n usmel afellay amaynut, kkes yiwen. Nnal ɣef usmel-nni war aḥbas syen fren "kkes".
Sbadu iseɣwan seg yismal web, seg yimaylen d yiznan i twaledyawt s wudem awurman deg Firefox.
